channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:52 AMAGABIBIBIUM The threat of the use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟢 18:52 AMAGABIBIBIUM The threat of the use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 18:52 Flowing anxiety in the Zaporizhzhia region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Pologovsky district

item.title: 🟡 18:06 Fragrant of anxiety in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 18:06 Fragrant of anxiety in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
